issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Looking at things in the Kitchen Sink with the sound_remote.js example. When using our MP3 stream (64k bit rate) it takes almost 20 seconds for the audio to start playing once you press the start button. Likewise... it is taking 20 seconds or so for the status message to change to stopped after hitting the stop button. This is mostly on my device tests (both HTC Inspire 4G and EVO 4G) both on WiFi
Am I missing a way to speed this process up? preloading isn't available inside the CreateAudioPlayer function is it?
I'm using Ti Studio with the latest released Mobile SDK.
Thanks
fields.summary: Audio Streaming Play takes 15+ seconds on Android
fields.environment: Mac OSX Lion, Latest titatnium studio and mobile SDK (released, not nightly). Test devices both on wifi: HTC Inspire 4G and HTC EVO 4G

comments.body:
Thank you for raising this ticket. If this is still an issue, then we need all the information listed in the [Jira Ticket Checklist|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-Summary%3AJiraTicketChecklist] in order to accept a ticket.

In this case, please specify the "latest release" versions that you are using and provide a complete use case for the issue.
Once the ticket is complete, we can look into moving it to the main project.

Thank you.

This ticket was opened with 1.7.3 being the mobile SDK and the nightly I believe was 1.8.

Please reopen this ticket so this can be fixed.
sound_remote_url.js (streaming part of the app here)
Tabs 2 3 and 4 are just empty files right now. Was getting the main part of the app (streaming) working before I worried about the easy parts

Closing due to inactivity. If this issue still exists, please raise a new ticket, including all the information in the [JIRA Ticket Checklist|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-JIRATicketChecklist] to ensure that we can escalate it quickly. Read [How to Submit a Bug Report|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report] if you have not read it before, and always start a ticket using the [JIRA Ticket Template|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/JIRA+Ticket+Template].

Thanks in advance
